configure-setting-wgAllDBsAreLocalhost: Rescriber silentemente tote le connexiones de base de datos verso le servitor local
configure-setting-wgDBAvgStatusPoll: Tempore medie inter consultas SHOW STATUS in conditiones de supercarga
configure-setting-wgDBerrorLog: File pro le registro de errores del base de datos
configure-setting-wgDBname: Nomine del base de datos a usar
configure-setting-wgDBport: Porta pro le servitor de base de datos
configure-setting-wgDBserver: Nomine de host o adresse IP del servitor de base de datos
configure-setting-wgDBtype: Typo de base de datos a usar
configure-setting-wgDBuser: Nomine de usator pro authentication in le base de datos
configure-setting-wgDBadminuser: Nomine de usator del administrator del base de datos
configure-setting-wgLocalDatabases: Altere bases de datos que pote esser administrate ab iste servitor
configure-setting-wgSearchType: Typo de cerca in base de datos a usar. Defini como le nomine de un classe pro usar un altere motor de recerca
configure-setting-wgSharedDB: Nomine del base de datos usate in commun
configure-setting-wgSharedPrefix: Prefixo del base de datos usate in commun
configure-setting-wgGenerateThumbnailOnP: Generar miniaturas de imagines al analyse syntactic del paginas que los contine
configure-setting-wgShowArchiveThumbnail: Presentar miniaturas del ancian imagines super le pagina de description del imagine
configure-setting-wgIgnoreImageErrors: Non monstrar messages de error pro imagines
configure-setting-wgIllegalFileChars: Characteres invalide in nomines de file
configure-setting-wgImageLimits: Limites de dimensiones del imagines pro le paginas de description
configure-setting-wgMaxAnimatedGifArea: Area maxime in pixeles pro imagines GIF animate
configure-setting-wgMaxImageArea: Area maxime in pixeles pro imagines
configure-setting-wgMediaHandlers: Plugins pro maneamento de typos de file multimedia
configure-setting-wgThumbnailScriptPath: Cammino verso thumb.php pro le generation immediate de miniaturas (e non al analyse syntactic del paginas)
configure-setting-wgThumbUpright: Factor de adjustamento de latitude pro le miniaturas redimensionate con "upright"
configure-setting-wgShowEXIF: Monstrar datos Exif in paginas de description de files
configure-setting-wgUpdateCompatibleMeta: Actualisar automaticamente le campo img_metadata si illo es obsolete ma compatibile con le version actual
configure-setting-wgUseImageResize: Activar le redimensionamento dynamic de imagines in le servitor
configure-setting-wgEnableAutoRotation: Rotar imagines secundo lor orientation EXIF
configure-setting-wgTrustedMediaFormats: Typos de multimedia e typos MIME pro considerar 'secur'
configure-setting-wgImgAuthDetails: Monstrar detalios del errores de accesso in img_auth.php
configure-setting-wgImgAuthPublicTest: Verificar que le imagines es publicamente accessibile e monstrar un error in img_auth.php si isto es le caso
configure-setting-wgTiffThumbnailType: Extension de file e typo MIME del formato in le qual transformar le imagines TIFF
configure-setting-wgMainCacheType: Typo del systema principal de cache
configure-setting-wgCachePages: Permitter immagazinar paginas in cache al latere del cliente
configure-setting-wgCachePrefix: Valor personalisate pro le prefixo de cache
configure-setting-wgClockSkewFudge: Secundas a adder al marcas temporal del cache pro compensar le imprecision del horologio
configure-setting-wgInvalidateCacheOnLoc: Invalidar varie caches quando LocalSettings.php cambia
configure-setting-wgFileCacheDirectory: Directorio pro le cache del files
configure-setting-wgFileCacheDepth: Profunditate del hierarchia de subdirectorios a crear sub $wgFileCacheDirectory
configure-setting-wgForcedRawSMaxage: Etate maxime predefinite pro accesso directe a CSS/JS
configure-setting-wgQueryCacheLimit: Numero de lineas a immagazinar in tabella 'querycache'
configure-setting-wgRevisionCacheExpiry: Expiration del cache de texto de versiones in MemCached (o 0 pro disactivar lo)
configure-setting-wgTranscludeCacheExpir: Expiration del cache de transclusiones interwiki
configure-setting-wgAllowExternalImages: Permitter le inclusion directe de imagines situate in altere sitos
configure-setting-wgEnableImageWhitelist: Activar le uso de "MediaWiki:External file whitelist"
configure-setting-wgAllowImageTag: Permitter le uso del etiquetta in wikitexto.
configure-setting-wgExpensiveParserFunct: Numero maxime de appellos per analyse de functiones onerose del analysator syntactic
configure-setting-wgGrammarForms: Formas grammatical pro le function GRAMMAR del analysator syntactic
configure-setting-wgMaxPPExpandDepth: Limite de profunditate del pila pro expansion de patrono de preprocessator
configure-setting-wgMaxPPNodeCount: Numero maxime de nodos que le preprocessator analysara
configure-setting-wgMaxTemplateDepth: Limite de profunditate de patrono pro preprocessator
configure-setting-wgMaxTocLevel: Nivello maxime de indentation pro tabulas de contento
configure-setting-wgParserCacheExpireTim: Tempore de expiration del cache del analysator syntactic
configure-setting-wgParserTestRemote: Specifica le installation CodeReview al qual inviar le datos del resultato del test al execution de "parserTests.php --upload"
configure-setting-wgRegisterInternalExte: Registrar ligamines externe punctante verso le mesme servitor
configure-setting-wgRestrictDisplayTitle: Requirer le uso de <nowiki>{{DISPLAYTITLE}}</nowiki> pro normalisar se al mesme titulo canonic del pagina
configure-setting-wgAmericanDates: Requirer 'May 12' in loco de '12 May' in anglese
configure-setting-wgDisableLangConversio: Disactivar le conversion de variante de lingua
configure-setting-wgDisableTitleConversi: Disactivar le conversion de variante de lingua pro titulos de paginas
configure-setting-wgForceUIMsgAsContentM: Messages de interfacie de usator a tractar como messages de contento
configure-setting-wgInterwikiMagic: Presentar le ligamines interwiki in un lista special
configure-setting-wgLegacyEncoding: Codification ancian del sito a converter
configure-setting-wgLoginLanguageSelecto: Presentar un selector de linguas in le formularios de aperir session e de registration
configure-setting-wgUseDatabaseMessages: Permitter le uso del spatio de nomines "MediaWiki" pro modificar le messages
configure-setting-wgEditPageFrameOptions: Permitter le incorporation del formulario de modification in un quadro
configure-setting-wgCapitalLinks: Le prime character in tote le titulo de paginas es majuscule
configure-setting-wgCapitalLinkOverrides: Configuration per spatio de nomines pro $wgCapitalLinks
configure-setting-wgExemptFromUserRobots: Spatios de nomines que non permitte le uso de <nowiki>__INDEX__</nowiki> e <nowiki>__NOINDEX__</nowiki>
configure-setting-wgDisabledVariants: Variantes disactivate pro le conversion de variantes de lingua
configure-setting-wgBetterDirectionality: Supporto experimental de melior direction de scriptura
configure-setting-wgCanonicalLanguageLin: Permitter ligamines canonic de linguas in metadatos
configure-setting-wgExtraSubtitle: Subtitulo (appare sub cata titulo de pagina)
configure-setting-wgHideInterlanguageLin: Celar le ligamines interlinguistic ab le barra lateral
configure-setting-wgLegalTitleChars: Characteres permittite in titulos de paginas (classe de characteres regex)
configure-setting-wgMaxRedirects: Numero maxime de redirectiones a sequer al resolver de redirectiones
configure-setting-wgNoFollowDomainExcept: Le ligamines externe verso iste nomines de dominio (o omne subdominios) non habera le attributo rel="nofollow"
configure-setting-wgPageShowWatchingUser: Listar le usatores que observa un pagina
configure-setting-wgStyleVersion: Version del files CSS/JS de MediaWiki
configure-setting-wgUniversalEditButton: Activar le Button de Modification Universal
configure-setting-wgUseExternalEditor: Permitter le uso de un editor externe
configure-setting-wgAjaxLicensePreview: Usar AJAX pro previsualisar le licentias pro files incargate
configure-setting-wgAllowAsyncCopyUpload: Permitter le incargamento asynchrone de copias
configure-setting-wgCopyUploadsDomains: Un lista de dominios de ubi pote provenir le incargamentos per copia
configure-setting-wgUploadMaintenance: Temporarimente disactivar le deletion/restauration de files
configure-setting-wgHashedUploadDirector: Usar un structura de subdirectorios pro immagazinar files incargate
configure-setting-wgStrictFileExtensions: Prohibir omne extension de file non preferite
configure-setting-wgUploadSizeWarning: Limine de alerta pro le dimension de files incargate
configure-setting-wgMaxUploadSize: Dimension maxime permittite de files incargate
configure-setting-wgUploadStashMaxAge: Etate maxime de files incargate temporari (incomplete), in secundas
configure-setting-wgHTTPTimeout: Durata de expiration pro le requestas HTTP
configure-setting-wgAsyncHTTPTimeout: Tempore de expiration pro requestas HTTP asynchrone
configure-setting-wgAllowSpecialInclusio: Permitter le inclusion de paginas special
configure-setting-wgExportAllowAll: Permitte exportar le wiki integre in un sol file ab [[Special:Export]]
configure-setting-wgExportAllowHistory: Permitter que le exportationes include le historia complete
configure-setting-wgExportAllowListContr: Permitter que un lista de contributores sia exportate
configure-setting-wgExportFromNamespaces: Permitter le option "exportar tote le paginas in le spatio de nomines" in [[Special:Export]]
configure-setting-wgFilterLogTypes: Typos de registro pro le quales presentar le option celar/revelar
configure-setting-wgImportTargetNamespac: Spatio de nomines de destination pro le importationes interwiki
configure-setting-wgMaxRedirectLinksRetr: Numero maxime de ligamines verso un pagina de redirection listate in Special:Whatlinkshere/DestinationDelRedirection.
configure-setting-wgQueryPageDefaultLimi: Numero predefinite de elementos a monstrar in paginas special que executa consultas, como [[Special:Whatlinkshere]]
configure-setting-wgRedirectOnLogin: Rediriger usatores verso iste pagina al aperir un session
configure-setting-wgSecureLogin: Permitter que le usator se authentica con https si ille arriva per http
configure-setting-wgUseNPPatrol: Usar patrulia de nove paginas pro impedir le vandalismo
configure-setting-wgAutopromote: Conditiones de promotion automatic de usatores a gruppos specific
configure-setting-wgAutopromoteOnce: Conditiones de promotion automatic de usator a gruppos specific que son facite solmente un vice
configure-setting-wgAccountCreationThrot: Numero de contos que cata adresse IP pote crear
configure-setting-wgBlockCIDRLimit: Intervallo CIDR maxime al blocar intervallos IP
configure-setting-wgAutoblockExpiry: Tempore de expiration del blocadas automatic, in secundas
configure-setting-wgDeleteRevisionsLimit: Numero de versiones que un pagina debe haber ante que le derecto ''bigdelete'' es requirite pro deler lo
configure-setting-wgNewPasswordExpiry: Le tempore de expiration, in secundas, de un contrasigno temporari inviate in e-mail
configure-setting-wgEmailConfirmToEdit: Requirer que le usatores confirma lor adresse de e-mail pro poter facer modificationes
configure-setting-wgEnableWriteAPI: Activar le API pro operationes de scriber
configure-setting-wgImplicitGroups: Gruppos que non es monstrate in [[Special:ListUsers]] e alteres
configure-setting-wgReadOnly: Prohibir le modification, monstrante iste texto qua motivo
configure-setting-wgReadOnlyFile: File con motivo del blocada del base de datos
configure-setting-wgSpamRegex: Expressiones regular pro le filtro antispam
configure-setting-wgSummarySpamRegex: Expressiones regular al filtro antispam pro le summarios de modification
configure-setting-wgWhitelistRead: Le paginas que un usator anonyme pote vider
configure-setting-wgEmailAuthentication: Requirer le authentication del addresses de e-mail pro poter usar le functiones de e-mail
configure-setting-wgEmergencyContact: Le adresse de e-mail del administrator del sito
configure-setting-wgEnableUserEmail: Activar le e-mail de usator a usator
configure-setting-wgNoReplyAddress: Adresses ficte que debe esser acceptate durante le action de inviar e-mail
configure-setting-wgPasswordSender: Adresse de e-mail pro le rememorationes del contrasigno
configure-setting-wgPasswordReminderRese: Tempore minime, in horas, que debe passar inter le rememorationes de contrasigno
configure-setting-wgAdditionalMailParams: Parametros additional de e-mail, le quales essera passate como le ultime parametro al appello del function mail() de PHP.
configure-setting-wgUserEmailUseReplyTo: Usar Reply-To in loco de From
configure-setting-wgUserEmailConfirmatio: Le tempore de expiration, in secundas, de un message de confirmation de e-mail
configure-setting-wgAPIRequestLog: File de registro pro requestas API
configure-setting-wgDebugComments: Includer portiones del registro in commentos HTML in le paginas.
configure-setting-wgDebugDumpSql: Reproducer le consultas SQL in le output de debugging
configure-setting-wgDebugLogGroups: Files pro gruppos specific de registros
configure-setting-wgDebugRawPage: Non includer le requestas pro paginas CSS/JS in le registro de debugging
configure-setting-wgDebugLogPrefix: Prefixo pro le lineas del registro de debugging
configure-setting-wgDebugRedirects: Monstrar le destination del redirection in loco de vermente rediriger verso le URL de destination
configure-setting-wgDebugPrintHttpHeader: Imprimer capites HTTP pro cata requesta in le information de debugging
configure-setting-wgDebugTimestamps: Prefixar le messages de debugging con un indication relative del hora
configure-setting-wgDebugToolbar: Monstrar le instrumentario de recerca de faltas
configure-setting-wgDevelopmentWarnings: Emitter messages de PHP pro alcun possibile conditiones de error e pro functiones obsolete
configure-setting-wgDeprecationReleaseLi: Limite de edition pro advertimentos de obsolescentia
configure-setting-wgShowExceptionDetails: Imprimer un traciamento complete del pila pro exceptiones
configure-setting-wgShowDBErrorBacktrace: Imprimer un traciamento complete del pila pro errores del base de datos
configure-setting-wgShowDebug: Presentar le datos de debugging al fundo del area de contento principal
configure-setting-wgShowSQLErrors: Monstrar le paginas de errores del base de datos
configure-setting-wgStatsMethod: Destination pro le datos de wfIncrStats()
configure-setting-wgJobRunRate: Numero de cargas a executar per visita de pagina
configure-setting-wgUpdateRowsPerJob: Numero de lineas a actualisar per carga
configure-setting-wgPoolCounterConf: Configuration pro le controlo de gruppos de processamento, pro uso in wikis con multe traffico
configure-setting-wgEnableSelenium: Permitter le execution de tests con Selenium
configure-setting-wgDBtestuser: Usator del base de datos que solmente ha le permission de crear e eliminar le base de datos de test
configure-setting-wgEnableJavaScriptTest: Permitte executar series de tests de JavaScript via [[Special:JavaScriptTest]]
configure-setting-wgJavaScriptTestConfig: Configuration pro le tests de JavaScript
configure-setting-wgAPICacheHelpTimeout: Durata del cache del texto de adjuta del API
configure-setting-wgAPIMaxDBRows: Numero maxime de lineas a scrutar in le consultas API del base de datos
configure-setting-wgAPIMaxResultSize: Grandor maxime (in bytes) de un resultato API
configure-setting-wgAPIMaxUncachedDiffs: Numero maxime de diffs non in cache que pote esser recuperate in un requesta API
configure-setting-wgDisableQueryPages: Disactivar tote le paginas de consulta si le modo-avaro es active, non solmente alcunes
configure-setting-wgDisableTextSearch: Disactivar le recerca del texto complete
configure-setting-wgEdititis: Monstrar le numero de modificationes del usator in varie locos prominente
configure-setting-wgAllUnicodeFixes: Sempre converter certe sequentias Unicode in sequentias moderne, sin reguardo al lingua del contento
configure-setting-wgFixArabicUnicode: Nettar le sequentias Unicode archaic in texto in arabe
configure-setting-wgFixMalayalamUnicode: Nettar le sequentias Unicode archaic in texto in malayam
configure-setting-wgFixDoubleRedirects: Reparar le redirectiones duple post le renomination de un pagina
configure-setting-wgInvalidRedirectTarge: Lista de destinationes invalide de redirectiones
configure-setting-wgMaximumMovedPages: Numero maxime de paginas a renominar automaticamente quando le subpaginas es renominate con un pagina
configure-setting-wgMemoryLimit: Le quantitate minime de memoria que MediaWiki "necessita"
configure-setting-wgMiserMode: Disactivar alcun functionalitate que exige multo del systema
configure-setting-wgShowHostnames: Exponer le nomines de host per API e commentos HTML
configure-setting-wgUseDumbLinkUpdate: Face DELETE/INSERT pro le actualisation de ligamines in loco de incremental
configure-setting-wgCacheVaryCookies: Un lista de cookies que face modificar le cache
configure-setting-wgCookieDomain: Dominio explicite pro le cookies de session
configure-setting-wgCookieHttpOnly: Fortiar que le cookies de authentication es inviate solmente per requestas HTTP
configure-setting-wgCookiePath: Cammino explicitemente declarate pro le cookies in iste dominio
configure-setting-wgHttpOnlyBlacklist: Lista nigre de agentes usator pro le modo HttpOnly
configure-setting-wgSessionHandler: Le mechanismo de PHP pro immagazinar sessiones
configure-setting-wgInternalServer: Le nomine interne del servitor como cognoscite per Squid, si differente
configure-setting-wgMaxSquidPurgeTitles: Numero maxime de titulos de pagina a purgar per operation
configure-setting-wgSquidMaxage: Tempore limite del cache pro Squid
configure-setting-wgSquidServers: Un lista de servitores proxy (adresses IP si possibile) a purgar a cata modification
configure-setting-wgSquidServersNoPurge: Un lista de servitores proxy (adresses IP si possibile) a non purgar
configure-setting-wgUseESI: Configuration requirite quando es usate Squid3 con supporto de ESI
configure-setting-wgUseXVO: Inviar le capite X-Vary-Options pro un melior cache (require un Squid adaptate)
configure-setting-wgVaryOnXFP: Adde "X-Forwarded-Proto" al capites "Vary" e "X-Vary-Options" pro requestas de API e syndicationes RSS/Atom
configure-setting-wgAllowSlowParserFunct: Permitter le functiones lente del analysator syntactic
configure-setting-wgAllowSchemaUpdates: Permitte executar actualisationes de schema de base de datos con le script "update.php"
configure-setting-wgSpecialPageCacheUpda: Functiones additional a executar con updateSpecialPages.php
configure-setting-wgSkinExtensionFunctio: Functiones pro extender le stilo graphic del interfacie
configure-setting-wgRevokePermissions: Derectos revocate ab usatores in cata gruppo
configure-setting-wgGroupsAddToSelf-valu: Gruppos al quales usatores mesme pote adder se
configure-setting-wgGroupsRemoveFromSelf: Gruppos del quales usatores mesme pote remover se
configure-setting-wgRateLimitsExcludedGr: Gruppos exempte del limites de frequentia
configure-setting-wgRateLimitsExcludedIP: Adresses IP exempte del limites de frequentia
configure-setting-wgAdvertisedFeedTypes: Typos de syndication que debe esser providite per predefinition
configure-setting-wgFeedCacheTimeout: Tempore limite 'minime' in secundas pro le syndication de modificationes recente in cache
configure-setting-wgFeedDiffCutoff: Grandor maxime de cata diff distribuite in syndication
configure-setting-wgFeedLimit: Numero maxime de resultatos per syndication
configure-setting-wgAdvancedSearchHighli: Activar le mitter in evidentia in le resultatos de recerca
configure-setting-wgEnableMWSuggest: Dar suggestiones quando tu scribe in campos de recerca
configure-setting-wgEnableOpenSearchSugg: Activar le requestas de suggestiones OpenSearch
configure-setting-wgEnableSearchContribu: Rediriger le recerca de un adresse IP al correspondente pagina de contributiones
configure-setting-wgGoToEdit: Le button "ir" remitte directemente al schermo de modification si le pagina non existe
configure-setting-wgMWSuggestTemplate: Patrono pro le motor interne de suggestiones de MediaWiki
configure-setting-wgSearchForwardUrl: Adresse URL al qual rediriger le recercas
configure-setting-wgSearchEverythingOnly: Render le preferentia "searcheverything" effective solmente pro usatores authenticate
configure-setting-wgSearchHighlightBound: Expression regular pro cercar limites inter parolas
configure-setting-wgSearchSuggestCacheEx: Tempore de expiration pro le responsas al suggestiones de recerca
configure-setting-wgCountTotalSearchHits: Lassar le motor de recerca contar le numero total de resultatos a presentar in Special:Search
configure-setting-wgUseTwoButtonsSearchF: Comportamento del formulario de recerca in le barra lateral
configure-setting-wgCountCategorizedImag: In [[Special:UnusedImages]], considerar le files como usate si illos es addite a un categoria
configure-setting-wgActiveUserDays: Tempore post le qual un usator es inactive
configure-setting-wgDisableCounters: Disactivar le contatores de visitas a paginas
configure-setting-wgHitcounterUpdateFreq: Frequentia de actualisation del contatores de visitas a paginas
configure-setting-wgArticleCountMethod: Methodo pro determinar si un pagina in un spatio de nomines a contento debe esser contate como un articulo valide
configure-setting-wgUseCommaCount: Usar un comma/virgula (true) o un ligamine (false) pro contar un pagina como pagina valide
configure-setting-wgWantedPagesThreshold: Numero minime de ligamines requirite pro listar un pagina in [[Special:WantedPages]]
configure-setting-wgVectorUseIconWatch: Observar e disobservar como icone in loco de un ligamine
configure-setting-wgVectorUseSimpleSearc: Usar un icone como button de recerca in loco del buttones Ir e Cercar
configure-setting-wgVectorShowVariantNam: Monstrar le nomine del variante de lingua actual como etiquetta in le menu disrolante de variantes
configure-setting-wgContentNamespaces: Spatios de nomines que es considerate de continer ver contento o paginas
configure-setting-wgExtraGenderNamespace: Spatios de nomines personalisate con distinction de genere
configure-setting-wgMetaNamespace: Nomine del spatio de nomines del projecto
configure-setting-wgMetaNamespaceTalk: Nomine del spatio de nomines pro discussion super le projecto
configure-setting-wgNamespaceAliases-val: ID del spatio de nomines de destination
configure-setting-wgNamespaceProtection-: Lista de derectos que concede le permission de modificar ''(un per linea)''
configure-setting-wgNamespaceRobotPolici: Politicas de robotes per spatio de nomines
configure-setting-wgNamespacesToBeSearch: Spatios de nomines cercabile per predefinition
Spatios de nomines a recercar quando un usator selige le scheda "{{int:searchprofile-project}}" in [[{{#special:search}}]]
configure-setting-wgNoFollowNsExceptions: Spatios de nomines ubi "nofollow" non es inserite in ligamines externe
configure-setting-wgPreviewOnOpenNamespa: Spatios de nomines de tractamento special con previsualisation al apertura
configure-setting-wgSitemapNamespaces: Spatios de nomines a includer in le mappa del sito
configure-setting-wgSitemapNamespacesPri: Prioritates personalisate per spatio de nomines pro mappas de sito
configure-setting-wgCategoryMagicGallery: Monstrar un galeria de miniaturas in le paginas de categoria
configure-setting-wgCategoryPagingLimit: Limite de pagination pro le entratas in categorias
configure-setting-wgCategoryCollation: Collation usate pro ordinar membros de categoria
configure-setting-wgHTCPMulticastTTL: Tempore limite (TTL) pro le purgamento multicast HTCP
configure-setting-wgHTCPPort: Porta pro le purgamento multicast HTCP
configure-setting-wgCopyrightIcon: HTML pro le icone de copyright
configure-setting-wgEnableCreativeCommon: Includer le informationes de licentia Creative Commons
configure-setting-wgMaxCredits: Numero maxime de autores date recognoscentia
configure-setting-wgRightsPage: Pagina que describe le licentia del sito
configure-setting-wgRightsText: Texto que describe le licentia del sito
configure-setting-wgRightsUrl: URL al qual es describite le licentia del sito
configure-setting-wgShowCreditsIfMax: Dar recognoscentia solmente al autores principal si il ha troppo
configure-setting-wgUseCopyrightUpload: Usar informationes de copyright detaliate al incargar files
configure-setting-wgAutoConfirmCount: Autoconfirmar le limite del numero de modificationes
configure-setting-wgAllowUserSkin: Permitter que le usatores cambia lor stilo graphic
configure-setting-wgAllowUserCssPrefs: Permitter preferentias de usator implementate in CSS
configure-setting-wgAutocreatePolicy: Quando crear automaticamente un conto local si un conto externe existe ja
configure-setting-wgAllowPrefChange: Regulas super como se permitte le modification de cata preferentia
configure-setting-wgExternalAuthType: Typo de authentication externe a usar
configure-setting-wgDisableAnonTalk: Disactivar le paginas de discussion pro le usatores anonyme (que non ha aperite un session)
configure-setting-wgInvalidUsernameChara: Characteres a impedir durante le creation de nove contos
configure-setting-wgUserrightsInterwikiD: Character usate qua delimitator al test del derectos de usator interwiki
configure-setting-wgMaxNameChars: Numero maxime de bytes in un nomine de usator
configure-setting-wgLivePasswordStrength: Suggestiones, a base de JavaScript, del fortitude de contrasignos
configure-setting-wgNewUserLog: Mantener un registro de nove usatores
configure-setting-wgPasswordResetRoutes: Methodos permittite pro recuperar un nomine de usator o contrasigno oblidate
configure-setting-wgReservedUsernames: Nomines de conto reservate pro le software
configure-setting-wgShowIPinHeader: Monstrar le adresse IP in le barra de usator
configure-setting-wgBrowserBlackList: Lista nigre de navigatores que non supporta Unicode
configure-setting-wgCommandLineDarkBg: Assumer un fundo obscur pro le scripts de mantenentia
configure-setting-wgUpgradeKey: Clave pro permitter le execution de actualisationes in config/index.php
configure-setting-wgSend404Code: Inviar un codice HTTP 404 "non trovate" pro paginas non existente
configure-setting-wgMaxShellFileSize: Grandor maxime de files create per processos de shell sub Linux, in KB
configure-setting-wgMaxShellMemory: Quantitate maxime de memoria virtual disponibile al processos de shell sub Linux, in KB
configure-setting-wgMaxShellTime: Tempore maxime de CPU in secundas pro le processos de shell sub Linux
configure-setting-wgUpdateRowsPerQuery: Numero de lineas a actualisar per consulta
configure-setting-wgUseCombinedLoginLink: Usar un ligamine combinate pro apertura de session e creation de conto
configure-setting-wgUseTagFilter: Permitter le filtration de modificationes con etiquettas in le modificationes recente, historia, etc.
configure-setting-wgDisableHardRedirects: Disactivar le redirectiones verso paginas special e paginas interwiki
configure-setting-wgImportSources: Lista de prefixos interwiki pro le importation transwiki
configure-setting-wgInterwikiFallbackSit: Sito de recurso pro le cache interwiki
configure-setting-wgRedirectSources: Expression regular pro restringer le URLs que essera monstrate como ligamines "redirigite ab"
configure-setting-wgBlockOpenProxies: Test automatic contra proxy aperte al modificar
configure-setting-wgEnableDnsBlacklist: Usar listas nigre DNS pro deteger proxies aperte
configure-setting-wgProxyPorts: Portas a scannar pro deteger proxy
configure-setting-wgDnsBlacklistUrls: Lista de listas nigre DNS a usar
configure-setting-wgUsePrivateIPs: Si le adresses IP private reinviate per un servitor proxy debe esser acceptate pro determinar le adresse IP de un usator
configure-setting-wgSQLiteDataDir: Directorio pro le datos de SQLite
configure-setting-wgDBClusterTimeout: Tempore limite pro le base de datos
configure-setting-wgDefaultExternalStore: Immagazinage externe predefinite pro nove versiones
configure-setting-wgMasterWaitTimeout: Tempore limite pro le retardo de replication
configure-setting-wgSlaveLagCritical: Limite pro le retardo 'critic' del bases de datos sclave
configure-setting-wgSlaveLagWarning: Tempore limite pro advertimento concernente le retardo del base de datos sclave
configure-setting-wgSVGMaxSize: Grandor maxime pro le redimensionamento de SVG
configure-setting-wgSVGMetadataCutoff: Longitude maxime pro lectura de metadatos SVG
configure-setting-wgSharpenReductionThre: Reduction in dimensiones linear sub le qual le imagine essera acutiate
configure-setting-wgDjvuOutputExtension: Extension del nomine del file pro le output del postprocessator DjVu
configure-setting-wgDjvuRenderer: Cammino verso le renditor "ddjvu" de DjVu
configure-setting-wgDjvuTxt: Cammino del utilitate djvutxt pro extraher texto DjVu
configure-setting-wgMemCachedTimeout: Tempore de expiration del connexion al servitor Memcached in microsecundas
configure-setting-wgCacheDirectory: Directorio pro le cache de datos in le systema de files local
configure-setting-wgUseLocalMessageCache: Facer un copia local del cache de messages, in addition a memcached
configure-setting-wgLocalMessageCacheSer: Usar le formato serialisate de PHP pro le cache local de messages
configure-setting-wgAdaptiveMessageCache: Sequer le requestas de messages e cargar solmente le messages le plus usate
configure-setting-wgMaxMsgCacheEntrySize: Grandor maxime del entratas in le cache de messages, in bytes
configure-setting-wgParserCacheType: Typo de cache del analysator syntactic
configure-setting-wgEnableParserCache: Activar le cache del analysator syntactic
configure-setting-wgEnableSidebarCache: Mitter in cache le ligamines del barra lateral
configure-setting-wgRenderHashAppend: Adjunger "sal" al numeros-clave del cache del analysator syntactic e del cache de notitias de sito
configure-setting-wgSidebarCacheExpiry: Expiration del cache del barra lateral
configure-setting-wgDebugTidy: Mitter le advertimentos Tidy in commentos HTML
configure-setting-wgTidyInternal: Usar le extension PECL pro Tidy
configure-setting-wgTidyOpts: Optiones passate a Tidy in le linea de commando
configure-setting-wgUseTidy: Usar Tidy pro assecurar que le output in HTML es san
configure-setting-wgValidateAllHtml: Resusar de monstrar paginas non valide
configure-setting-wgRawHtml: Permitter le HTML crude e non verificate in sectiones {{int:ellipsis}}
configure-setting-wgDisableUploadScriptC: Disactivar le verification de scripts in files incargate
configure-setting-wgAllowJavaUploads: Permitter le incargamento de archivos Java
configure-setting-wgCleanupPresentationa: Mitter tante attributos HTML de presentation como possibile in CSS
configure-setting-wgEnableTooltipsAndAcc: Activar le application de claves de accesso e de legendas
configure-setting-wgHtml5Version: Valor del attributo "version" in le etiquetta
configure-setting-wgWellFormedXml: Tentar facer que le producto HTML sia XML ben formate
configure-setting-wgDocType: Typo de documento a usar in le declaration DOCTYPE
configure-setting-wgDTD: DTD in le declaration DOCTYPE pro output de pagina
configure-setting-wgAllowMicrodataAttrib: Activar le attributos de microdatos HTML5 pro uso in wikitexto
configure-setting-wgAllowRdfaAttributes: Activar attributos RDFa pro uso in wikitexto
configure-setting-wgAllowUserCss: Permitter que usatores ha folios de stilo (CSS) personalisate
configure-setting-wgAllowUserJs: Permitter que usatores ha paginas JavaScript personalisate
configure-setting-wgUseSiteCss: Usar le folios de stilo cascadente (CSS) del sito
configure-setting-wgUseSiteJs: Usar le pagina JavaScript del sito
configure-setting-wgHandheldForIPhone: Applicar le typos 'screen' e 'handheld' pro iPhone
configure-setting-wgIncludeLegacyJavaScr: Includer le ancian bibliotheca JavaScript e su dependentias
configure-setting-wgLegacyJavaScriptGlob: Assignar variabiles de configuration al spatio global in JavaScript
configure-setting-wgResourceBasePath: Valor predefinite pro le "cammino de base remote" pro le modulos del cargator de ressources ($wgScriptPath essera utilisate si iste valor resta vacue)
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderDebug: Activar modo de deteger errores pro requestas ResourceLoader
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderInline: Incorporar modulos private in le output HTML
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderMaxage: Periodo maxime in secundas pro immagazinar in cache le ressources servite per le cargator de ressources
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderMaxQue: Longitude maxime de catenas de consulta pro appellos al cargator de ressources (-1 pro disactivar)
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderMinifi: Longitude maxime de lineas pro le minification de JavaScript
Mitter cata commando in su proprie linea durante le minification de JavaScript
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderUseESI: Permitter le incorporation de certe ressources usante "Edge Side Includes"
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderValida: Analysar le modulos JavaScript cargate ab paginas wiki ante le minification pro validar los
Analysar le modulos JavaScript cargate ab files ante le minification pro validar los
configure-setting-wgAjaxSearch: Permitter le uso de autosuggestion AJAX pro le barra de recerca
configure-setting-wgAjaxUploadDestCheck: Activar le verification AJAX contra superscriber files ante le incargamento
configure-setting-wgAjaxWatch: Activar le observation/disobservation de paginas usante AJAX
configure-setting-wgCrossSiteAJAXdomains: Dominios autorisate a facer requestas AJAX trans sitos al API de MediaWiki
configure-setting-wgCrossSiteAJAXdomainE: Dominios non autorisate a facer requestas AJAX, mesmo si illos corresponde a un del dominios autorisate per $wgCrossSiteAJAXdomains
configure-setting-wgJsMimeType: Typo de media (typo MIME) a usar pro le scripts JavaScript
configure-setting-wgLoadFileinfoExtensio: Cargar le extension FileInfo al execution
configure-setting-wgMimeDetectorCommand: Programma pro deteger le typo MIME
configure-setting-wgMimeInfoFile: File con informationes super typos MIME
configure-setting-wgMimeTypeFile: File con definitiones de typos MIME
configure-setting-wgVerifyMimeType: Verificar le typo MIME de files incargate
configure-setting-wgCacheSharedUploads: Mitter le metadatos commun in memcached
configure-setting-wgUseInstantCommons: Usar Wikimedia Commons como repositorio de files externe
configure-setting-wgHashedSharedUploadDi: Facer un hierarchia de subdirectorios in le directorio de files commun
configure-setting-wgRepositoryBaseUrl: URL de base pro le repositorio partite
configure-setting-wgSharedThumbnailScrip: Cammino verso le script pro facer miniaturas de files commun
configure-setting-wgSharedUploadDBname: Base de datos pro files commun
configure-setting-wgSharedUploadDBprefix: Prefixo del base de datos pro files commun
configure-setting-wgSharedUploadDirector: Cammino in le systema de files verso ubi se trova le files commun
configure-setting-wgSharedUploadPath: Cammino complete in le servitor web verso ubi se trova le files commun
configure-setting-wgUseSharedUploads: Uso in commun de files incargate
configure-setting-wgAppleTouchIcon: Icone de marcapaginas pro Apple Touch
configure-setting-wgArticlePath: URL de base pro le ligamines interne intra MediaWIki
configure-setting-wgCanonicalServer: Nomine del servitor con le protocollo a usar pro ligamines verso le wiki ab altere locos
configure-setting-wgDeletedDirectory: Cammino in le systema de files al directorio in le qual placiar le incargamentos delite
configure-setting-wgDirectoryMode: Permissiones de accesso pro nove directorios
configure-setting-wgDiff: Cammino verso le utilitate GNU diff
configure-setting-wgDiff3: Cammino verso le utilitate GNU diff3
configure-setting-wgFooterIcons: Icones monstrate al fin del pagina
configure-setting-wgRedirectScript: URL de redirect.php, necessari pro retrocompatibilitate
configure-setting-wgPhpCli: Nomine del executabile del cliente PHP cli (php/php5)
configure-setting-wgScriptExtension: Extension a adjunger al nomines de scripts per predefinition
configure-setting-wgScriptPath: Le URL de base del sito
configure-setting-wgServer: Le URL de base del servitor
configure-setting-wgStyleDirectory: Cammino del systema de files verso le directorio de apparentias
configure-setting-wgLocalStylePath: Le mesme que $wgStylePath, ma non deberea punctar a un dominio externe
configure-setting-wgStyleSheetPath: URL del directorio continente le folios de stilo
configure-setting-wgUploadBaseUrl: URL de base pro le files incargate si un directorio pro files commun non es usate
configure-setting-wgUploadDirectory: Cammino del systema de files verso le directorio pro files incargate
configure-setting-wgUploadNavigationUrl: URL del ligamine de navigation pro cargar files
configure-setting-wgUploadMissingFileUrl: URL externe del ligamine de incargamento pro files mancante
configure-setting-wgUploadPath: URL del directorio pro files incargate
configure-setting-wgVariantArticlePath: Cammino pro le paginas de variante de lingua
configure-setting-wgUploadStashScalerBas: Cammino pro miniaturas de imagines usate durante le redimensionamento remote sur demanda
configure-setting-wgAllowCategorizedRece: Permitte filtrar le modificationes recente per un categoria o un de su sub(subsubsub…)categorias
configure-setting-wgPutIPinRC: Registrar le adresses IP in le tabella 'recentchanges'
configure-setting-wgAutopromoteOnceLogIn: Registrar promotion automatic in modificationes recente
configure-setting-wgRCChangedSizeThresho: Mitter in evidentia, in le modificationes recente, un differentia de numero de characteres minor que iste
configure-setting-wgRCFilterByAge: Filtrar $wgRCLinkDays pro evitar monstrar ligamines pro valores plus grande que $wgRCMaxAge
configure-setting-wgRCLinkLimits: Limite de modificationes a monstrar in le modificationes recente
configure-setting-wgRCLinkDays: Limite de dies a includer in le modificationes recente
configure-setting-wgRCMaxAge: Etate minime de entratas in le modificationes recente a purgar
configure-setting-wgRCShowChangedSize: Monstrar le quantitate de characteres cambiate in le modificationes recente
configure-setting-wgRCShowWatchingUsers: Monstrar le usatores observante in le modificationes recente, observatorio e historia de paginas
configure-setting-wgShowUpdatedMarker: Monstrar le marcator "Actualisate (desde mi ultime visita)" in le modificationes recente, observatorio e historia de paginas
configure-setting-wgUseRCPatrol: Usar le patrulia de modificationes recente pro verificar le presentia de vandalismo
configure-setting-wgRC2UDPAddress: Adresse pro le notification de modificationes recente via UDP
configure-setting-wgRC2UDPInterwikiPrefi: Adder un prefixo interwiki al notificationes de modificationes recente via UDP
configure-setting-wgRC2UDPOmitBots: Omitter le modificationes per robotes ab le notificationes de modificationes recente via UDP
configure-setting-wgRC2UDPPort: Porta pro le notificationes de modificationes recente via UDP
configure-setting-wgRC2UDPPrefix: Prefixo pro le lineas del notificationes de modificationes recente inviate via UDP
configure-setting-wgBlockAllowsUTEdit: Permitter que un usator blocate modifica su proprie pagina de discussion
configure-setting-wgBlockDisablesLogin: Refusar le apertura de session al usatores blocate
configure-setting-wgSysopEmailBans: Autorisar le administratores a prohibir le accesso de usatores a [[Special:EmailUser]]
configure-setting-wgEnotifFromEditor: Usar le adresse de e-mail del editor del pagina (e non illo del servitor wiki) como expeditor de notificationes de e-mail
configure-setting-wgEnotifImpersonal: Inviar un e-mail generlc in loco de un e-mail personalisate pro cata usator
configure-setting-wgEnotifMaxRecips: Numero maxime de usatores a contactar in un sol vice quando es usate e-mail generic
configure-setting-wgEnotifMinorEdits: Notificationes in e-mail etiam pro "modificationes minor" (es monstrate un preferentia e le usator debe optar pro activar lo)
configure-setting-wgEnotifRevealEditorAd: Le adresse Reply-to de notificationes in e-mail pote esser definite como le adresse del editor del pagina (es monstrate un preferentia e le usator debe optar pro activar lo)
configure-setting-wgEnotifUseJobQ: Inviar messages de e-mail via le cauda de actiones
configure-setting-wgEnotifUseRealName: Usar le nomine real in loco del nomine de usator in le campo "From" del messages de e-mail
configure-setting-wgEnotifUserTalk: Option de inviar e-mail pro le prime modification al pagina de discussion del usator (es monstrate un preferentia e le usator debe optar pro activar lo)
configure-setting-wgEnotifWatchlist: Option de inviar e-mail pro le prime modification al paginas observate (es monstrate un preferentia e le usator debe optar pro activar lo)
configure-setting-wgUsersNotifiedOnAllCh: Lista de usatores que recipera e-mail pro cata modification que occurre in un wiki
configure-setting-wgDebugFunctionEntry: Producer un message de debugging a cata wfProfileIn/wfProfileOut
configure-setting-wgDebugProfiling: Deteger le appellos non correspondente a wfProfileIn/wfProfileOut
configure-setting-wgProfileCallTree: Imprimer un arbore crude de cellulas in loco de un reporto per function
configure-setting-wgProfileLimit: Registrar solmente le analyse de rendimento pro paginas que exigeva plus tempore que iste
configure-setting-wgProfileOnly: Non registrar informationes non connexe con le analyse de rendimento
configure-setting-wgProfilePerHost: Inserer le nomine del servitor de applicationes in le tabella de analyse de rendimento
configure-setting-wgProfileToDatabase: Registrar le summas ab le analyse de rendimento in le tabella 'profiling' del base de datos
configure-setting-wgUDPProfilerHost: Host pro le analyse de rendimento via UDP
configure-setting-wgUDPProfilerPort: Porta pro le analyse de rendimento via UDP
